pages.title: Welcome to Your 3D Printing Gallery
pages.intro: Empowering 3D printing enthusiasts with a platform to showcase their creations, connect with the community, and elevate their passion.

items.title: Your Creative Hub
items.description: Explore a personalised space to showcase your 3D-printed projects, from unique designs to technical marvels.

items.title: Seamless Integration
items.description: Enjoy an integrated platform with features like a gallery, Stripe payments, and a user-friendly interface.

items.title: Connect and Inspire
items.description: Join a thriving community of makers, share ideas, and find inspiration for your next big creation.

pages.title: About Your 3D Printing Gallery
pages.intro: Welcome to ReFilament! Our mission is to drive sustainability in the 3D printing world by transforming waste plastic into valuable materials for new creations. We believe that innovative solutions are key to reducing plastic waste, and we’re dedicated to making the 3D printing industry more eco-friendly, one filament spool at a time.

items.title: Who are we?
items.description: At ReFilament, we specialise in recycling failed prints, repurposing them into filament, plastic sheets, and injection-moulded products.

items.title: Passionate About Development
items.description: Our team is passionate about up-cycling and finding creative ways to give materials a second chance.

items.title: Join the Community
items.description: Join us in rethinking what’s possible with recycled plastic. Let’s build a sustainable future together, one print at a time.

pages.title: Your 3D Printing Gallery Services
pages.intro: Are you a 3D printing enthusiast looking to showcase your work, connect with others, or share your unique creations online? Imagine having a simple, clean, and customisable website—tailored to your needs, easy to update, and visually stunning.
pages.description: With ReFilament Web Services, building your own 3D printing portfolio site has never been easier. Our platform offers simplicity with powerful customisation, allowing you to focus on your creations without the hassle of complicated setups.

items.title: Simple Yet Powerful Design
items.description: Built with Tailwind CSS and Vue.js, your site combines simplicity with a responsive, modern layout that can be easily styled to match your brand or personality.

items.title: Fully Customisable Content
items.description: Our sites are powered by JSON data, allowing you to add, edit, or remove content effortlessly.

items.title: Rich Features for Creators
items.description: With gallery support, dynamic image sliders, and space to share your latest prints, highlight what you do best in style.

items.title: Flexible Hosting Options
items.description: Host your site wherever works best for you—on Vercel, GitHub Pages, or your own preferred platform.

items.title: Get Started Today
items.description: If you’re interested in a website that grows with your creativity, reach out to learn more or dive in.
